/opt/homebrew/bin/mpifort -O3 -fopenmp -ffree-form -cpp -fallow-argument-mismatch -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.3.sdk CMakeFiles/advectRossbyWave.exe.dir/AdvectRHWave.f90.o -o advectRossbyWave.exe  ../src/liblpmFortran.a -Wl,-framework,Accelerate
